mapper.insert: insert into realtime_event ( dev_code, dev_type, event_type, event_sub_type, is_confirm, event_time, event_detail, confirm_operator, confirm_detail, confirm_time, lowmachine_key, is_sync, update_time )values ( #{realtimeEvent.devCode}, #{realtimeEvent.devType}, #{realtimeEvent.eventType}, #{realtimeEvent.eventSubType}, #{realtimeEvent.isConfirm}, #{realtimeEvent.eventTime}, #{realtimeEvent.eventDetail}, #{realtimeEvent.confirmOperator}, #{realtimeEvent.confirmDetail}, #{realtimeEvent.confirmTime}, #{realtimeEvent.lowMachineKey}, #{realtimeEvent.isSync}, #{realtimeEvent.updateTime} )
